translationBanner: Some comments translated via Google Translate.

checkoutCard.title: Your order
checkoutCard.finalPriceBanner: No hidden fees – the price you see here is the total amount, inclusive of all charges.
checkoutCard.terms: I have read and agree to Bringist’s <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>
checkoutCard.selectCountryForShippingQuote: Shipping cost calculated based on the destination

paymentCard.title: Payment method
paymentCard.creditDebitDescription: You will be asked to provide your card details in the next step.
paymentCard.codDescription: Payment method will be available soon!

codFailureReasons.OutstandingShipmentsAndNewBasketTotalExc:
The total outstanding payment-on-delivery balance for items in your cart and pending deliveries cannot exceed 500,000 som (before applying discounts). To place a new order with payment-on-delivery:
- Wait for your current payment-on-delivery orders to be delivered,
- Reduce your cart total, or
- Choose an alternative payment method to complete your order immediately.
codFailureReasons.OutstandingShipmentsExceedsLimit: The payment-on-delivery amount in your cart before discounts cannot exceed 500,000 som. To place a new order with payment-on-delivery, reduce your cart total or use another payment method to complete your order immediately.
codFailureReasons.CustomerNotEligible: Your account is not eligible to place orders with payment-on-delivery. For more information, please contact customer support.
codFailureReasons.CountryNotEligible: COD is not available in your country.

clearModal.title: Warning
clearModal.body: Would you like to clear your shopping cart?

success.title: Payment received
success.body:
Your order number is:
**{id}**

Your order will be processed and shipped as soon as possible.

noOrders.title: It's empty here!
noOrders.body: You do not have any orders yet.

processing.label: Processing
processing.description: Your order is being processed. We will start preparing your order when processing is completed.

preparing.label: Preparing
preparing.description: We are preparing your order for you and will ship it as soon as possible.

shipped.label: Shipped
shipped.description: Your order is on its way and will arrive shortly.

cancelled.label: Cancelled
cancelled.description: Your order has been cancelled and you will be refunded. Please contact support to find out more.

portal.title: Pay via Uzcard/Humo
portal.codeDescription: Please enter the confirmation code sent via SMS
portal.error: An error occured. Please check the values you entered and try again.
